text: The prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic is the head of government of Laos. It is the highest office within the Central Government. ==List== Portrait Name Term of office Term of office Term of office President(s) Portrait Name Took office Left office Time in office President(s) 1 Kaysone Phomvihane 8 December 1975 15 August 1991 Souphanouvong Phoumi Vongvichit 2 Khamtai Siphandon 15 August 1991 16 February 1998 Kaysone Phomvihane Nouhak Phoumsavanh 3 Sisavath Keobounphanh 16 February 1998 27 March 2001 Khamtai Siphandon 4 Bounnhang Vorachith 27 March 2001 8 June 2006 5 Bouasone Bouphavanh 8 June 2006 23 December 2010 Choummaly Sayasone 6 Thongsing Thammavong 23 December 2010 20 April 2016 7 Thongloun Sisoulith 20 April 2016 22 March 2021 Bounnhang Vorachith 8 Phankham Viphavanh 22 March 2021 Incumbent Thongloun Sisoulith 9 Sonexay Siphandone 30 December 2022 Incumbent ==Living former prime ministers== Bounnhang Vorachit.JPG|Bounnhang Vorachith born 1937 (age ) Bouasone.jpg|Bouasone Bouphavanh born 1954 (age ) Thongsing Thammavong.jpg|Thongsing Thammavong born 1944 (age ) Dr Phankham Viphavanh.jpg|Phankham Viphavanh born 1951 (age ) ==References==
title: Prime Minister of Laos
